thread.title: Hotel stay to visit antique markets - Review
thread.title_full: Hotel stay to visit antique markets - Review of Timhotel Paris XVII Bd Berthier, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: rkent8
title: Hotel stay to visit antique markets - Review
text:
Well positioned for visiting Clignancourt market and Marche aux Puces de la Porte de Vanves as hotel is outside metro Porte de Clichy and both markets are on metro routes. Outside the hotel are lots of roads works but it did not prevent us from reaching the metro easily.
Room Tip: The showers are in the bath which is very short. Don't step backwards when under the shower as... See more room tips
